segments.text: I see the woman completely absorbed in her task, polishing a plate as the water overflows from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle at her feet grows wider with each passing second, but she remains blissfully unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a twinge of worry for her, standing there without a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, on the other hand, seem to delight in the chaos behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy precariously balances on the stool, and my heart races as I contemplate the danger he's in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, her hand raised in anticipation, a picture of innocence and mischief combined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how easily everything could go wrong in an instant, but they seem to have no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR
